title: Lunker Recordings
description: Independent record label website. This was an early web project for dad. He requested a website for his record label, so i built it and used it as practice for my react skills!

title: Wedding Website
description: Wedding website for my partner and I. General wedding template including an rsvp form, registry, time/location info, and image gallery.

title: My Blog
description: My personal blog website, using obsidian for content and markdown file organization

title: Weird Web October 2025
description: Collection of websites made for a webtober event (inspired by inktober)
